text: a#syaiq SarI#raqM gAM ~MvAva tau tat parya#vadatAqM ~MyA yaqj~jE dIqyatEq sA prAqNEna# dEqvAn dA#dhAraq yayA# manuqShyA# jIva#ntiq sA vyAqnEna# manuqShyAn# yAM piqtRuByOq Gnantiq sA&pAqnEna# piqtRUn. ya EqvaM ~MvEda# paSuqmAn Ba#vaqtyathaq vai tAmupA$hvaq iti# hOvAcaq yA praqjAH praqBava#ntIqH pratyAqBavaqtItyannaqM ~MvA a#syaiq tadu - [  ] 8
